title: Patient No-Show Prediction
description: Built a predictive model to identify patients likely to miss medical appointments using scikit-learn. Included EDA, class balancing, and feature importance analysis.

title: Health & Sociodemographic Regression
description: Performed linear and Lasso regression to uncover patterns in US county health data. Focused on relationships between health outcomes and income, education, and access.

title: Google Play Sentiment Classifier
description: Trained a Naive Bayes model on Google Play app reviews to classify sentiment. Applied NLP techniques like tokenization, TF-IDF, and model evaluation.
